conbody.p: multithreaded pipelineresource usageresource usagemultithreaded pipelinesSince each pipeline runner performs all processing associated with the pipeline after the origin, each thread in a multithreaded pipeline requires roughly the same resources as the same pipeline running on a single thread.
When working with multithreaded pipelines, review the resource usage of the pipeline and increase the Max Pipeline Memory pipeline property as needed.
You should also monitor the resource usage and increase the Java heap size when appropriate.
